titleStmt.title: Iudge Barkely his penitentiall complaint: wherein he laments the condition of his present imprisonment, and the late corruptions of violated and inforced iustice.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "What wonder's this, to heare a Terme should be ..."
Imperfect: Item at A1:1[9] mutilated, affecting text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
